channel.title: [508] Friends List [508]
channel.description: In my server, when you add a player to your friends list and ignore list it shows up. when you relog, they both disappear, if the server hasn't restarted and you type in again the same username, it will show the username after you typed it in at "add friend" and it shows a message this user is already on your friends list. anyone help?

item.title: [508] Friends List [508]
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

um… can someone please post the void that is used for saving those 2

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Friends List [508]
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Check your client.java or whatever for anything that saves character files.

Then find the void that adds friends, and add the save file void.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Friends List [508]
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

In my server, when you add a player to your friends list and ignore list it shows up. when you relog, they both disappear, if the server hasn’t restarted and you type in again the same username, it will show the username after you typed it in at “add friend” and it shows a message this user is already on your friends list. anyone help?

Read full topic
